using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;
using NUnit.Framework;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.NUnit.Input
{
	using System.Threading;
	public partial class AssertThatNoToken
	{
		public Task ReadAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(CancellationToken))
		{
			return SimpleFile.ReadAsync(cancellationToken);
		}

		public async Task TestAsync()
		{
			await (ReadAsync());
			Assert.That(() => ReadAsync(), Throws.Nothing);
			Assert.That(() => WriteAsync(), Throws.Nothing);
			await (WriteAsync());
		}

		public Task WriteAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(CancellationToken))
		{
			return SimpleFile.ReadAsync(cancellationToken);
		}
	}
}
